page.title: 03COMMUNITY POLICE BARNSTAPLE.
page.content: Some of our area is policed by a community {Policeman,}here is a description of his job. The {Policeman has about 20 square miles to cover. He does this by car.He and his family live within the area he is responsible for.He enjoys his job sometimes but it can get risky when you do certain areas on your own and you're under pressure. He has 10500 people to police.The{Policeman}hates shiftwork. Some mornings he gets up at 5.30 am. and works till 1.30 pm.He works 40 hours a week altogether.He does an 8 hour shift for 5 days a week.He thinks community policing works best on a small scale.Here it is different from other police forces because you don't seem to be at the "sharp end" of things.He would improve his force by equipping it with a helicopter and more sea rescue crafts.
